headline: CSX Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer to Address Bank of America Industrials, Transportation & Airlines Key Leaders Conference
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., May 06, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CSX Corp. (NASDAQ: CSX) Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, Sean Pelkey, will address the Bank of America Industrials, Transportation & Airlines Key Leaders Conference in New York on Tuesday, May 13, at 8 a.m. Eastern time. This address will be broadcast live via webcast at http://investors.csx.com. A replay will be available following the conclusion of this event. This announcement, as well as additional financial informatio
